alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Campbell, western Weston and southwestern Crook Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 500 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Gillette to 4 miles east of Dull Center. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rozet. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 122 and 150. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston
